Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Anthropic \An*throp"ic\, Anthropical \An*throp"ic*al\, a. [Gr. ?, fr. ? man.] (Zo["o]l.) 1. Like or related to man; human. [R.] --Owen. [1913 Webster]
2. relating to the period of mankind's existence [WordNet 1.5] ||
anthropic adj : relating to mankind or the period of mankind's existence [syn: {anthropical}]
